articles.title: 2nd National Meeting of Persons of Merits in Songun Era Opens
articles.content:
2nd National Meeting of Persons of Merits in Songun Era Opens
 Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- The second national meeting of persons of merits in the era of Songun was opened here on Wednesday.
					 The meeting will review the successes and experience gained in the course of waging a movement to follow the examples set by the persons of merits in the era of Songun and discuss the issue of developing this movement in depth in an effort to expand the ranks of persons of distinguished services and encourage the officials and other party members and working people to make a positive contribution to flinging open the gate to a thriving nation by registering great results.
					
					 It was attended by Kim Yong Nam and other senior party and state officials, leading officials of working people's organizations, officials in the field of the party ideological work and persons of merits in the era of Songun from across the country.
					
					 A congratulatory message of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea to the participants of the meeting was read out at the meeting.
					
					The message referred to the fact that the movement to follow the examples set by the persons of merits in the era of Songun initiated and led by President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il has displayed great influence and vitality in the ideological and moral life of the Korean people and socialist construction.
					
					 The C.C., the WPK, notes with high appreciation that the participants in the meeting and the persons of merits in the era of Songun from across the country have displayed matchless devotion and the self-sacrificing spirit in the drive for the prosperity of the socialist country, moving all the people, and performed labor feats and brought about innovations stirring up the era, taking the lead in upholding the WPK's idea and leadership, the message said.
					
					 It expressed belief that the said participants and persons of merits and all other officials, party members and working people would perform heroic feats and demonstrate the revolutionary stamina of Songun Korea and invincible national power to the whole world in the all-out charge for opening the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation, single-mindedly united around Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Choe Thae Bok, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK, in his report at the meeting said that it is the honor and pride for the party and people that a large number of persons of merits in the era have emerged as models of true human beings of Juche type by leaving clear traces in their lives on the road of Songun by rendering worthy services and registering great results with intense loyalty to the party and the leader and patriotic enthusiasm and thus touched people and aroused them to a fruitful struggle and exploits.
					
					 The reporter called upon all the people to learn from the spirit of devotedly defending the leader, indomitable mental power displayed by the persons of merits in the era of Songun and thus uphold Kim Jong Il with faith and conscience, unite closer around the headquarters of the revolution in thinking and purpose and with the sense of moral obligation and become genuine Songun revolutionary comrades who share idea, will and destiny with him. 
					
					 Speeches were made at the meeting. 
					
					 The meeting goes on.

articles.title: Choe Thae Bok Meets Mexican Party Delegation
articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok Meets Mexican Party Delegation
Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, met and had a talk with the delegation of the Workers' Party of Mexico headed by Leobardo Alcantara Martinez, member of its National Executive Committee and director of the party training institution, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Tuesday.
					 The head of the delegation said that during the visit to the DPRK he knew well about the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung and the Songun politics, the independent politics for the people pursued by General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He stressed that Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed immortal exploits by leading the revolution and construction.
					
					 The Workers' Party of Mexico will put the precious experience gained by the WPK in party building into practice, he noted.
					
					 He expressed the will to contribute to boosting the friendly relations between the two parties.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from "INTER RAO UES"
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from "INTER RAO UES"
Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by E.V. Dod, managing chairman of the OAO "INTER RAO UES" Company Ltd. of Russia.
					The gift was conveyed to an official concerned on Wednesday by Ivin D.G., deputy general director of the Eastern Energy Company of the OAO "INTER RAO UES" Company Ltd., on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Anniversary of Establishment of DPRK-Russia Diplomatic Ties Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Establishment of DPRK-Russia Diplomatic Ties Marked
 Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- The DPRK embassy in Moscow arranged a reception on Oct. 13 to mark the 61st anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and the Russian Federation.
					 Present there on invitation were Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs of Russia Saltanov and other officials of the Foreign Ministry, the Defense Ministry, the Ministry of Regional Development, the Ministry of Economy and Development, the Ministry of Culture, the Ministry of Extraordinary Situation, the Ministry of Agriculture and the Moscow City Government, deputies to the State Duma and the Federation Council and officials of the "United Russia" Party, the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia, the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, "A Just Russia", the Liberal Democratic Party of Russia and the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK.
					
					 On hand were Ambassador Kim Yong Jae and staff members of the DPRK embassy in Moscow.
					
					The participants paid tribute to the full-length picture of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il after placing a floral basket and bouquets before it. Then they looked round photos on Songun Korea.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 The DPRK ambassador said that the establishment of diplomatic relations between the DPRK and Russia 61 years ago marked an event of historic significance in developing the friendly and cooperative relations between the peoples of the two countries.
					
					 It is the invariable stand of the DPRK government to develop the bilateral relations of friendship and cooperation, he said, confirming that the DPRK would make all efforts to steadily strengthen and develop the bilateral relations according to the joint documents agreed upon by the top leaders of the two countries and in the spirit of inter-state treaties, in the future, too.
					
					 The vice-minister of Foreign Affairs of Russia expressed conviction that the long-standing Russia-DPRK relations of friendship and cooperation would make steady fresh progress in mutual interests in various fields by the joint efforts of the two governments and peoples in the future, too.
					
					 The joint efforts for the expansion of bilateral cooperation will contribute to promoting welfare of the two peoples and ensuring peace and security in the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Asia, he stressed.
					
					 A reception was also held in Khabarovsk on Oct. 16.

articles.title: DPRK Stamp Exhibition Held in China
articles.content:
DPRK Stamp Exhibition Held in China
 Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- A DPRK stamp exhibition was held in Beijing from October 16 to 18 on the occasion of the "year of DPRK-China friendship".
					On display in the exhibition hall were at least 4,600 kinds of Korean stamps, including commemorative stamp "Year of DPRK-China friendship" (two kinds of sheetlets), which deal with the history of the DPRK-China friendship which President Kim Il Sung provided and cultivated together with revolutionaries of the elder generation of China and General Secretary Kim Jong Il has steadily consolidated and developed together with leaders of the new generation.
					
					 Present at an opening ceremony of the exhibition were Chinese officials concerned, philatelists and the delegation of the Korean Stamp Exhibition.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 Meanwhile, a seminar on DPRK stamps took place in Beijing.

articles.title: Palestinian Embassies Help Korean Farmers
articles.content:
Palestinian Embassies Help Korean Farmers
 Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan, Palestinian ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy here did friendly work at the DPRK-Palestine Friendship Oryu Cooperative Farm in Sadong District, Pyongyang, Wednesday.
					 After being briefed on the history of the farm before the monument to the field guidance given by President Kim Il Sung, the guests looked round a mosaic portraying the President.
					
					 Then they helped farmers in threshing rice.
					
					 They handed aid materials to the farm.

articles.title: Indoor Swimming Pool of Kim Il Sung Univ.
articles.content:
Indoor Swimming Pool of Kim Il Sung Univ.
 Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- The well-arranged Indoor Swimming Pool of Kim Il Sung University is crowded with teachers, staff members and students building up their physical strength and enjoying a cultural rest.
					 It has a wading pool and a large-sized swimming pool equipped with high-grade facilities for international games.
					
					 If you enter the central hall through an automatic revolving door you can see a large-sized Korean painting showing the beautiful sea scenery on the opposite wall.
					
					 The swimming pool has eight runways and diving towers. Water temperature of the pool is 27 degrees C and the indoor temperature is 28 degrees C at all times.
					
					 There are recumbent water concussors and shower bath facilities in the wading pool with nearly 50-meter-long slide.
					
					 It has also modernly furnished public service facilities such as far infrared ray sauna and other saunas and shower, bath and medical rooms.

articles.title: North Hwanghae Province, Jujube-producing Area
articles.content:
North Hwanghae Province, Jujube-producing Area
 Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- North Hwanghae Province, a leading jujube-producing area of the DPRK, has been visited by a bumper jujube this year.
					 Jujube trees in orchards and around dwelling houses, institutions, industrial establishments, schools and other public buildings in Sariwon City and Unpha, Pongsan and Hwangju counties are heavily laden with fruits.
					
					 Jujube produced in Yangdong-ri, Unpha County, is famous for its good taste.
					
					 The province has conducted in a perspective way the work for planting and spreading widely high-yielding jujube trees with Yangdong-ri as a model. 
					
					 As a result the province has gathered a large amount of jujube every year from the jujube trees planted in the fields of thousands of hectares on the fruit-growing farms and co-op farms, along roads and in gardens.
					
					 The province is directing great efforts to increasing jujube production.

articles.title: Vladivostok Mayor Reiterates Efforts to Boost Russia-DPRK Friendly Relations
articles.content:
Vladivostok Mayor Reiterates Efforts to Boost Russia-DPRK Friendly Relations 
 Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- I will make positive efforts to boost the Russia-DPRK friendly and cooperative relations, said Igor Pushkarev, mayor of the Vladivostok City of the Russian Federation, when interviewed by KCNA before his departure from here at the end of his visit to the DPRK on Tuesday.
					 Russia and the DPRK have cooperated with each other for years as neighbors, he said, and went on:
					
					The friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries have developed at a new high level as former Russian President Putin visited Pyongyang and General Secretary Kim Jong Il paid visits to Russia.
					
					 The talks held between the top leaders of the two countries and the joint documents signed there made a great contribution to the development of the relations between the Russian and Korean peoples.
					
					 The exchange and cooperation between the two countries are now under way in various fields. 
					
					 I am convinced that the Russia-DPRK friendly and cooperative relations will grow stronger in line with the desire of the peoples of the two countries and the spirit of the joint documents agreed upon between the two sides.
					
					 It is my hope that the friendly Korean people will achieve greater successes in the drive for building a rich and powerful country under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Italian
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Italian
 Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- Miriam Pellegrini Ferri, chairman of the Group of Dialectical Materialist of Italy, issued a statement titled "The Korean people's pride of having the great leader" on October 10 to mark the 64th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 83rd anniversary of the Down-with-Imperialism Union.
					 The statement said that the Korean people are lucky as they have the great leader.
					
					 Noting that Kim Jong Il's political idea is to believe in people as in Heaven, it said that he made the people's power and all other organs of the state and society serve the people and officials share their lot with the people, freeing themselves from abuse of power and bureaucratism.
					
					 Praising him as the great person finding his pleasure in people's happiness, the statement said:
					
					 His personality as the paramount leader of people can be found in the fact that he set the slogan "We serve the people!" as that to be held high by the WPK and the people's power bodies.
					
					 The Korean people are dynamically advancing along the road of socialism chosen by themselves without any vacillation and vicissitude under the leadership of the WPK rallied as one around their leader despite the difficult and unfavorable situation in every aspect.

articles.title: Anniversary of WPK Celebrated in Austria
articles.content:
Anniversary of WPK Celebrated in Austria
 Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- The Group of Youth for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche Idea in Vienna issued a bulletin to commemorate the 64th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 83rd anniversary of the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU).
					The bulletin carried a photograph of President Kim Il Sung standing together with General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The bulletin noted in an article that the President formed the DIU on October 17, 1926, liberated Korea on August 15, 1945 and founded the WPK on October 10, 1945.
					
					 It elaborated on the fact that under the leadership of the WPK, all democratic reforms were successfully carried out in Korea after its liberation and the DPRK won a brilliant victory in the Fatherland Liberation War and completed the socialist industrialization in a short span of time.
					
					 The WPK thoroughly applied the Juche idea, founded by the President, in all realms of social life, it noted.
					
					 Noting that Kim Jong Il started his work at the WPK Central Committee in 1964 and has turned the DPRK into a powerful socialist fortress by wisely leading the party and revolution and socialist construction, the bulletin said: He is wisely leading the struggle to realize the independent and peaceful reunification of the country, true to Kim Il Sung's last instructions for national reunification.

articles.title: DPRK Important Days Observed in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
DPRK Important Days Observed in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held in Russia and a photo exhibition in Nigeria between October 9 and 17 to celebrate the 64th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 83rd formation anniversary of the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU).
					 Displayed at the exhibition hall were photographs on the achievements gained by the Korean sportspersons in games and the good qualities of the Korean nation.
					
					 At the meeting held in Russia, speakers highly praised the WPK as the political organization which inherited the brilliant traditions of the DIU, the genuine staff of revolution which rallied the people of different strata around the leader and the vanguard of revolution dynamically promoting the Korean people's drive for building a great prosperous and powerful nation under the banner of Songun.
					
					 They stressed that the DPRK would open the gate to a thriving nation in the near future under the leadership of the WPK and that nobody will dare to provoke the DPRK and it will always emerge victorious as it has the WPK, the powerful political staff.
					
					 The curator of the Exhibition of the Council of Art and Culture under the Ministry of Federal Capital Territory of Nigeria hoped that the WPK would achieve only victory in building a thriving socialist nation under the outstanding leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A message of greetings to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the meeting held in Russia. 
					
					 Meanwhile, a meeting to convey a congratulatory letter and a floral basket to Kim Jong Il was held by a Russian company on October 8.

articles.title: Woolen Underwear and Gloves
articles.content:
Woolen Underwear and Gloves
 Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- The anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk was engaged in knitting by a campfire one night in November of Juche 26 (1937).
					 A guerrilla silently approached her and said that she should have a rest as the night was far advanced.
					
					 She made haste with her work, saying that it should be finished within the night.
					
					 He was surprised to see what she was doing.
					
					 She was knitting gloves by unraveling her woolen underwear.
					
					 The underwear was presented to her by members of a revolutionary organization.
					
					 She came back to the unit after carrying out the underground work a few days ago. Then she told guerillas that she was moved to tears by the sincere souvenir the people had arranged by sparing every penny in dire poverty and would preserve the underwear with care and make revolution with credit until the day of the national liberation and live up to their expectation. And she had kept it in her knapsack with care.
					
					 Next morning she handed to an orderly of the headquarters a package of the gloves which she had knitted all night.
					
					 She asked him to give the gloves to General Kim Il Sung without fail when it got colder and detailed him how to protect the General on march and during break.
					
					 Later General Kim Il Sung was told about the story. Then he stood still for a long time, thinking of days of trial she had to undergo in the terrible winter without the underwear.

articles.title: Inaugurada conferencia nacional de benemeritos
articles.content:
Inaugurada conferencia nacional de benemeritos 
Pyongyang, 21 de octubre (ATCC) -- Quedo inaugurada el dia 21 en esta capital la II Conferencia  Nacional de los Benemeritos de la Epoca del Songun (priorizacion militar).
					  La reunion hara balance sobre los exitos y experiencias logrados en el proceso de librar dinamicamente el movimiento por aprender de los benemeritos de la epoca del Songun y discutira el problema de aumentar las filas de los benemeritos profundizando este movimiento y de hacer que los funcionarios, los militantes del partido y otros trabajadores contribuyan activamente con grandes exitos a abrir de par en par las puertas a la gran potencia prospera.
					
					  Estuvieron presentes Kim Yong Nam y otros cuadros del partido y el Estado, los funcionarios directivos de las organizaciones de masas, los funcionarios de la rama de la labor ideologica del partido y los benemeritos de la epoca del Songun de todo el pais.
					
					  En la ocasion se dio lectura al mensaje de felicitacion del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea dirigido a los participantes en dicha conferencia.
					
					  El documento se refiere a que el movimiento por aprender de los benemeritos de la epoca del Songun propuesto y conducido por el Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il puso de manifiesto la gran influencia y vitalidad en la vida ideo-espiritual del pueblo coreano y en la construccion socialista.
					
					  Subraya que el CC del PTC elogia en alto que en pleno acato a la idea y la direccion del partido, los participantes en la conferencia y los benemeritos de la epoca del Songun de todo el pais demuestran la abnegacion y espiritu de sacrificio sin parangon en la lucha por la prosperidad de la patria socialista y  crean las hazanas laborales e innovaciones que  influyen a todo el pueblo y agitan la epoca.
					
					  Expresa la conviccion de que todos los funcionarios, los militantes del partido y otros trabajadores incluyendo los participantes en el conclave y otros benemeritos de la epoca del Songun de todo el pais, unidos monoliticamente en torno al Dirigente Kim Jong Il, crearan los meritos heroicos en la ofensiva general para abrir las puertas a la gran potencia prospera y demostraran a todo el mundo el espiritu revolucionario de Corea del Songun y el invencible poderio nacional, subraya el documento.
					
					  Choe Thae Bok, miembro suplente del Buro Politico y secretario, del CC del PTC dijo en su informe que crecieron numerosos prototipos de verdaderos hombres del tipo jucheano, los benemeritos de la epoca quienes con la fidelidad infinita al partido y el lider y el entusiasmo patriotico, dejan las huellas de la vida en el camino del Songun con la contribucion y exito valiosos y anadio que ellos emocionan a los hombres y conducen a estos a la digna lucha y meritos, lo cual es el honor y orgullo de nuestro partido y pueblo.
					
					Subrayo que todo el pueblo debe seguir el espiritu de defender al lider a costa de la vida y la invencible potencia espiritual demostrados por los benemeritos de la epoca del Songun, apoyar al Dirigente Kim Jong Il con la conviccion y conciencia, unirse mas firmemente en lo ideo-volitivo y con obligacion moral en torno a la Direccion de la Revolucion y ser verdaderos camaradas de la revolucion del Songun que comparten la idea, el proposito y el destino con el Dirigente.
					
					En la conferencia hubo discursos.
					
					La conferencia continua.

articles.title: Acto central por aniversarios de obras de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Acto central por aniversarios de obras de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
						
Pyongyang, 21 de octubre (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 20 en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el acto central por el 40o aniversario de la publicacion de la obra del Presidente Kim Il Sung "Algunos problemas que se presentan para mejorar la labor estadistica en el socialismo" y del 10o del envio del mensaje del Dirigente Kim Jong Il "Para mejorar y fortalecer la labor estadistica en el socialismo" a los participantes en el cursillo nacional de los funcionarios de esta rama.
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes el premier Kim Yong Il y los vicepremieres Ro Tu Chol y O Su Yong, el jefe de departamento del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Pak Nam Gi, los cuadros directivos de ministerios y organos centrales y los funcionarios de la rama estadistica.
					
					En su obra publicada el 21 de octubre del 58 (1969) de la Era Juche, partiendo de la definicion clasica de que la estadistica es precisamente el socialismo, el Presidente enseno en detalles el rumbo y los remedios para intensificar la estadistica socialista, inclusive el sistema de la labor estadistica, el principio fundamental que rige en la elaboracion de tablas estadisticas, el contenido y el metodo de este trabajo y la medida para garantizar las condiciones materiales necesarias.
					
					En el mensaje del Dirigente fechado 21 de octubre del 88 (1999) de la Era Juche estan sintetizados generalmente la idea y la teoria del Juche sobre la estadistica socialista y los remedios para registrar un gran viraje en esta labor conforme a la demanda de la revolucion en desarrollo.
					
					Al presentar el informe de la ocasion, O Su Yong dijo que bajo la sabia direccion del Presidente, se establecio el sistema de la autoctona estadistica socialista basado en el orden unificado.
					
					En virtud del sistema referido, -anadio- se implanto la ferrea disciplina de fortalecer la direccion del partido sobre la labor en cuestion y organizar y desplegar todos los trabajos bajo la guia unica del organo estadistico central y se prepararon firmemente las filas de los funcionarios y la base material y tecnica de esta rama, de manera que la estadistica pudiera cumplir con exito su mision y deber.
					
					Destaco que el Dirigente condujo energicamente para que la estadistica desempenara su deber y papel en impulsar la construccion de una gran potencia prospera socialista al materializar cabalmente la linea del partido sobre la construccion economica de la epoca del Songun.
					
					  Prosiguio que bajo la sabia direccion del partido y el lider, la estadistica socialista de Corea logro grandes exitos cumpliendo excelentemente su mision y rol.
					
					  Finalmente, llamo a producir un nuevo viraje revolucionario en esa labor al materializar consecuentemente la idea y la teoria de la autoctona estadistica socialista conforme a la demanda de la realidad en que se libra la ofensiva general por la victoria final de la gran causa por la construccion de una gran potencia prospera bajo la direccion del Songun del PTC.

articles.title: Choe Thae Bok se reune con delegacion del PTM
articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok se reune con delegacion del PTM
Pyongyang, 21 de octubre (ATCC) -- El secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Choe Thae Bok, departio el dia 20 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con la delegacion del Partido del Trabajo de Mexico presidida por Leobardo Alcantara Martinez, miembro del Comite Ejecutivo Nacional del PTM y director de la Coordinacion Nacional de Talleres de Formacion Politica-Ideologica.
					  En la ocasion el jefe de la delegacion mexicana dijo que durante su visita a Corea, pudo conocer mejor sobre la idea Juche creada por el Presidente Kim Il Sung y la politica de Songun (priorizacion militar) y la independiente para el pueblo que practica el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					  Subrayo que el Presidente y el Dirigente realizaron hazanas imborrables conduciendo la revolucion y la construccion.
					
					  Prosiguio que su partido pondra en practica las preciosas experiencias que obtuvo el PTC en la construccion del partido.
					
					  Expreso su voluntad de contribuir al fomento de las relaciones de amistad entre ambos partidos.

articles.title: Embajada coreana en Rusia ofrece banquete
articles.content:
Embajada coreana en Rusia ofrece banquete
Pyongyang, 21 de octubre (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 61o aniversario del establecimiento de las relaciones diplomaticas entre la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la Federacion Rusa, se ofrecio el dia 13 un banquete en la embajada coreana en Rusia 
					A la recepcion fueron invitados el vicecanciller Saltanov y otros funcionarios de los ministerios de Relaciones Exteriores, de Defensa, de Desarrollo Regional, de Desarrollo Economico, de Cultura, de Situacion Emergente y de Agricultura.
					
					Tambien, figuraban los funcionarios del gobierno de la ciudad de Moscu, los diputados a la Duma Estatal y al Consejo de la Federacion y los funcionarios del Partido "Rusia Unida", el Partido por la Paz y Unidad, el Partido Comunista de la Federacion, el Partido "Rusia de Justicia", el Partido Liberal Democratico, y la Asociacion Rusa por la Amistad y Cooperacion Cultural con la RPDC. 
					
					Estuvieron presentes el embajador coreano Kim Yong Jae y otros miembros de la misma sede diplomatica. 
					
					Tras colocar cestos y ramos de flores ante el retrato de cuerpo completo del Presidente           Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il estando juntos, los participantes les rindieron saludo, y recorrieron las fotos que dan a conocer a Corea del Songun (priorizacion militar). 
					
					En la ocasion hubo discursos. 
					
					El embajador coreano dijo que el establecimiento de las relaciones diplomaticas Corea-Rusia de hace 61 anos fue el evento de significado historico en el desarrollo de las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los pueblos de los dos paises. 
					
					Desarrollar estas relaciones es la posicion invariable del gobierno de la RPDC, subrayo y afirmo que en adelante tambien la RPDC hara todos sus esfuerzos por fortalecer invariablemente las relaciones entre los dos paises conforme al espiritu de los documentos conjuntos acordados por los dirigentes de ambos paises y al tratado interestatal. 
					
					El vicecanciller ruso expreso la conviccion de que gracias a los esfuerzos comunes de los gobiernos y los pueblos de ambos paises, los vinculos de amistad y cooperacion Rusia-Corea de larga tradicion seguiran logrando tambien en el futuro nuevo desarrollo en varias ramas conforme a los intereses mutuos. 
					
					Los esfuerzos comunes por ampliar y fortalecer la cooperacion bilateral contribuiran al fomento del bienestar de ambos pueblos y a la preservacion de la paz y seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto de Asia. 
					
					En tanto, en Jabarovsk tambien se ofrecio el dia 16 el banquete.
